summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of all 8 ERP pages with edit/add/print functionality. All features working correctly: Inventory (edit + RFID + ESL), Invoices (view + print), Customers (add + edit), Suppliers (add + edit), Purchases (details + RFID), POS (checkout + invoice print), Users (edit + password change), Warehouses (edit).
critical_code_review_comments: All 8 pages properly implement Dialog components from ShadCN for add/edit functionality
RFID Tag and ESL Device ID fields correctly implemented in Inventory and Purchases pages
POS checkout now correctly shows invoice dialog with print button immediately after sale
Users page has both Edit and Change Password buttons working correctly
All pages support Arabic and English languages with proper RTL layout
seed_data_creation: Test invoice created during POS checkout testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 pages tested and working. Key features verified: 1) Inventory - Edit product dialog with RFID Tag and ESL Device ID fields, 2) Invoices - View list with details dialog and print button, 3) Customers - Add and Edit dialogs working, 4) Suppliers - Add and Edit dialogs working, 5) Purchases - Details dialog shows RFID column, Add dialog has RFID Tag field, 6) POS - Checkout shows invoice dialog immediately with print button, 7) Users - Edit dialog and Change Password dialog both working, 8) Warehouses - Edit dialog working with all fields.
